com.software.reuze

Class ga_AABB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ga_AABB

  • public class ga_AABB
extends Object
    An implementation of an Axis Aligned Bounding Box Point p is the bottom-left point of the box in the normal Cartesian plane with positive Y up and positive X right. Point p2 is the top-right point of the box.
    Author:
    Keith

      • createFromDiagonal

        public static ga_AABB createFromDiagonal(float x1,
                         float y1,
                         float x2,
                         float y2)
        Creates a Rect that will have its x and y coordinates in the bottom left corner of the cartesian coordinate system. Note that this will be in the top left corner of the Java2D coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        x1 -
        y1 -
        x2 -
        y2 -
        Returns:
